snippet: Mr. Gay was a self-taught novelist from rural Tennessee who emerged from obscurity in his late 50s with critically praised books in the Southern Gothic style.
abstract: William Gay, self-taught and critically praised novelist from rural Tennessee, dies at age 70.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Gay was a self-taught novelist from rural Tennessee who emerged from obscurity in his late 50s with critically praised books in the Southern Gothic style.

headline.seo: William Gay, Novelist Rooted in Tennessee, Dies at 70
headline.main: William Gay Dies at 70; Writer Tied to Tennessee
headline.print_headline: William Gay Dies at 70; Writer Tied to Tennessee
